stories.title: A total lunar eclipse will turn the moon red

stories.text:
A few weeks ago I started with the curriculum on https://teachyourselfcs.com, with the goal of completing it within a year.
I'm looking for communities where I can find people with similar interests. e.g. where they go through books in an organised way or discuss problems.
stories.title: Ask HN: What are some good learning communities for self-taught engineers?

stories.text:
I've been having symptoms for a long time but so far I thought that it's depression and not CFS.

Have you been diagnosed with it? How difficult was it go get help? How did it affect your life? Did any treatments work?
stories.title: Ask HN: What has been your experience with chronic fatigue syndrome?
